### [The Devil's Advocate (1997)](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0118971/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1)

Director: Taylor Hackford

Starring: Keanu Reeves, Al Pacino, Charlize Theron

Genre: Supernatural Thriller/Drama

Ratings: IMDb: 7.5/10; Rotten Tomatoes: 63%

---

### We Watched It

The Devil's Advocate is a supernatural thriller that blurs the line between legal drama and dark fantasy. Keanu Reeves plays a hotshot lawyer, Kevin Lomax, who lands a dream job at a prestigious New York law firm. But things turn sinister when he meets his enigmatic boss, John Milton (Al Pacino), who isn't exactly what he seems. As Kevin gets deeper into his new life, his morality—and soul—are put to the test. The pacing is a bit slow in places, but the film’s shocking twists and rich philosophical themes about temptation and morality make it a must-watch for fans of psychological thrillers.

![The Devil's Advocate (1997)](/images/the-devils-advocate--1997--A4Nz.webp)

---

### Behind the Scenes

Al Pacino initially turned down the role of John Milton several times before finally agreeing to take it on. He stated that it was one of the most complex characters he had ever played.

---

### 3 Short Films

[Paperman (2012)](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2388725/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1) – This Oscar-winning animated short tells the sweet story of a man trying to reconnect with a woman he meets by chance using paper airplanes. With beautiful animation and no dialogue, it’s a heartwarming gem that blends romance with innovation.  

[The Present (2014)](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt3682556/?ref_=fn_al_tt_3) – A touching animated short about a young boy and a three-legged puppy, this film is a profound look at acceptance and companionship, leaving a lasting emotional impact despite its short run time.  

[Cargo (2013)](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt2842128/?ref_=fn_al_tt_5) – This Australian short film offers a poignant, unique take on the zombie apocalypse. In it, a father must protect his infant daughter at all costs. Its emotional weight and tight storytelling make it a must-watch for horror lovers with a heart.

---

### Quote of the Week  

"You mustn’t be afraid to dream a little bigger, darling." – Inception (2010).
